price: តើគេបានដឹងនូវរឿងអាថ៌កំបាំង ឬមួយគេបានទទួលយក ការសន្យាណាមួយពីម្ចាស់មហាសប្បុរសឬ?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
